title: Aliexpress.com Scraper
description: An actor that scrapes products from aliexpress.com

maxConcurrency.title: Maximum Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum concurrency that you want to run actor

startPage.title: Category start page
startPage.description: The page number that you want to start with.

endPage.title: Category end page
endPage.description: The page number that you want to end with. By default there is no end page.

categoryStartIndex.title: Category start index
categoryStartIndex.description: Category index that you want to start on. You can limit crawling categories with that attribute

categoryEndIndex.title: Category end index
categoryEndIndex.description: Category index that you want to end with. You can limit crawling categories with that attribute. By default there is no end index.

includeDescription.title: Description
includeDescription.description: Include description for products. It might slow the process a bit

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler.
